summary: SkyrimFontGen is a swf font generator for all language.
descriptionHtml:
[size=6]SkyrimFontGen[/size]

[size=2]Note: Please forgive me my lousy English. My mother tongue is Japanese.[/size]

[size=5][About][/size]
[size=3]This is a script that generate Skyrim swf font file by using Flex SDK.
I created this to convert multibyte font file to swf.
I recommended to create single byte font with "swfmill", not this tool.[/size]

[size=5][How to use][/size]
[size=3]Just open "SkyrimFontGen.exe" and follow the dialog.[/size]

[size=5][Other][/size]
[size=3]Read "readme.txt" for more information. Thank you.[/size]

[size=5][Changelog][/size]
Jan.20.2017 - 0.1.0 - First release. This only includes japanese language support.
Jan.22.2017 - 0.2.0 - Add English support. Set the default language to English. Improved ease of use.
Jan.26.2017 - 0.2.2 - Fixed license problem. Improved ease of use.
author: maiqin
